name: Hillary vs Trump io (opoly)
description:
Hillary vs Trump io is a property trading board game about the 2016 United States presidential campaign. Learn more about the two presidential candidates as you buy/trade presidential opponents, primaries, caucuses, robocalls, national conventions, and try to avoid "scandals". Change your cards to match the dynamic changes in the 2016 presidential election.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
